Cheat.Description: Three stored weapons will be exchanged, when you first open the storage case: Handcannon for Killer 7; Skull Shaker for Stingray; Chicago Sweeper for Rocket Launcher Infinite. In case you just wanted to exchange one or two of them, turn the cheat off, take the weapons you don't want to change, leave the storage/case, turn the cheat on and open the case again.

[03b][Special] LEON: Store First Aid Spray And Get Biosensor Scope

Cheat.Description: Every time Leon stores a weapon, a new one will be there. It will loop through all the possible weapons Leon can use.

The same as above but for Ada. Ada can get all of the Leon`s weapons plus 5 new ones: Tactical Knife, Blacktail AC, Punisher MC, Sawed-off W-870 and Blast Crossbow. Some same weapons from Leon have another ID. They were updated for Ada.
When Leon selects a key item in slot 1 (first one on the left), this one will be changed to a new one. All the possible key items will be looped.
The same as above goes for Ada. I have just included the key items she can get, even the ones than can`t actually be examined: Blue Butterfly, etc.
Unselect to have normal speed again, x1.
If this cheat is not on, the weapon will dissappear every time it is stored.

Cheat.Text: [55][Separate Ways] Hold X Doors Open Instantly
[56][Separate Ways] Hold X Doors Stay Open

Cheat.Description: This one can open doors that need an item-key to CONTINUE. Which means, if you do not know what you are doing, you will get stuck. JUST FOR EXPERIENCED PLAYERS WHO KNOW WHERE TO AVOID THIS CHEAT.
Actually it has a small repercution on the game but it can also get you stuck. That is why the DANGEROUS label. You can open some more (very few) doors that are locked.
